help.short: Create Create Azure Data Catalog service operation creates a new data catalog service with the specified parameters. If the specific service already exists, then any patchable properties will be updated and any immutable properties will remain unchanged.
Delete Delete Azure Data Catalog Service operation deletes an existing data catalog.
List List catalogs in Resource Group operation lists all the Azure Data Catalogs available under the given resource group.
Get Get Azure Data Catalog Service operation retrieves a json representation of the data catalog.
Update Update Azure Data Catalog Service operation can be used to update the existing deployment. The update call only supports the properties listed in the PATCH body.
